speechRecognition.title: I tried using a phrase book but gave up because it was full of phrases I never use

quiz.title: I found phrases I wanted to know and generated them with AI, but I left them untouched without reviewing them

progress.title: I thought I had memorized phrases, but I couldn't use them in actual conversations

feature1.title:
Your "personal phrase collection"
is practical
feature1.description: AI translates the phrases you wanted to know into natural expressions. Because it's your original phrase collection, you can immediately feel the benefits. You can also choose your preferred expression from three generated options.

demo.input: How long have you been living in Japan?
outputs: 日本にはどのぐらい住んでいるの？
日本に住んで何年になりますか？
日本にいらしてどのくらいになりますか？

feature2.title:
Reading count feature provides
thorough support "until you memorize"
feature2.description: Language can't be spoken just by "knowing" it. Aim for 10 readings per day per phrase, with a total of 50 readings, until it comes out naturally from your mouth through thorough repetition.

demo.input: 日本にはどのぐらい住んでいるの？
demo.output: How long have you been living in Japan?

feature3.title:
Check your "instant response"
with quiz features
feature3.description: Whether phrases memorized through reading practice can be used in actual conversations. If you can instantly respond to memorized phrases using the quiz feature, you'll be able to speak fluently in actual conversations too.

demo.input: 日本にはどのぐらい住んでいるの？
demo.output: How long have you been living in Japan?

q1.question: Is there a limit to phrase generation?
q1.answer: You can use it up to 5 times per day.
q1.answerDetail: Let's steadily build up 5 phrases every day.

q2.question: When does the phrase generation count reset?
q2.answer: It resets at 0:00 UTC (Coordinated Universal Time).
q2.answerDetail: In Japan Standard Time, it resets at 9:00 AM (winter time) or 8:00 AM (summer time). In Vancouver time, it resets at 4:00 PM (winter time) or 5:00 PM (summer time).

q3.question: Is Solo Speak free to use?
q3.answer: Basic features are currently available for free.
q3.answerDetail: We may introduce paid features in the future as we expand our services, but we will notify you in advance.
